text: Members of the Board of Overseers are elected by Harvard degree holders. Following are the board’s current members, with their terms of service shown in parentheses:
President, Sunshine Care Foundation for Neurological Care and Research, and Senior Counsel, Bracebridge Capital
Senior Advisor and Co-Founder, City Year
Frances Willard Professor of Human Development and Social Policy and Vice Provost for Academics, Northwestern University
Global Co-Head, Securities Division, The Goldman Sachs Group, Inc.
Deputy Secretary for Policy and Planning and Director of Clinical Affairs, California Health and Human Services Agency, and Professor of Medicine, University of California, San Francisco
Former Associate Justice, Massachusetts Supreme Judicial Court
Artist, and President of Studio Echelman
Chief Executive Officer, Hudson’s Bay Company
Professor of Physics, Professor of Mathematics, and Director, Center for Theoretical Physics, Columbia University
Vice Chair of Wealth Management, Senior Client Advisor and Managing Director, Morgan Stanley
President and CEO, United Way for Southeastern Michigan
Managing Partner, McKinsey & Company, United Kingdom & Ireland
Koch Professor of Biology, Massachusetts Institute of Technology; and Director, Koch Institute for Integrative Cancer Research
Judge, U.S. District Court for the District of Columbia
Professor of Obstetrics and Gynecology, David Geffen School of Medicine at University of California at Los Angeles
President and CEO, The Education Trust
Executive Vice President, Chief Product and Design Officer, Intuit Inc.
Chief Operating Officer and Corporate Secretary, The Juilliard School
Director, Policy Research Center, National Congress of American Indians
Founder and CEO, Girls Who Code
Regents’ Professor Emerita, Department of Neuroscience, University of Arizona
Senior Vice President, Global Affairs, and Chief Legal Officer, Google LLC
John Silvanus Wilson, Jr. (2015-2021) - on leave
